title: Skyline Kotte Welcome Home! (1st Floor Units)
details:
Skyline Kotte is a 30-unit luxury apartment complex which provides 5-star living at an affordable price. It brings a new level of luxury to the lush, green hideout of Kotte.

Apartments comprise of:

• 3 bedrooms
• Spacious living & dining area
• Modern pantry with granite top
• 2 bathrooms
• Maid's room & bathroom
• 3 large balconies overlooking the peaceful town & surrounding suburbs
• Premium bathware & kitchen fittings
• Doors & windows with solid wood mahogany
& much more.

Common Facilities:
• Dual elevators
• 1 Parking slot with extra provision
• Rooftop - pool, Gym, Spa, Sauna & Jacuzzi
• 24 hour security & surveillance
& much more.

Available units & Prices:
B2 - LKR 21 Million
A1 - LKR 22 Million
B1 - LKR 20 Million
C1 - LKR 21 Million
E1 - LKR 22.5 Million

Call us to view mock-up apartment or for more details visit us on skylineproperties.lk for more details.
